#summary Old-style CvMatND

= Reference =

Structure CvMatND is replaced by the more robust and more efficient MatND class. 

|| *OpenCV* || *PyOpenCV* ||
|| CvMatND || MatND ||
|| cvMatND, cvCreateMatNDHeader, cvCreateMatND, cvInitMatNDHeader || MatND's constructors ||
|| cvReleaseMatND || no need to call, but if you insist: MatND.release ||
|| cvCloneMatND || MatND.clone ||
